Hey Guys! :slightly_smiling_face:

I would like to create an "ACCEPT QUOTE" button at the end of quote templates.

*When clicked the button should do the following:*
1. Mark the quote as ACCEPTED within HubSpot
2. Send an email to the quote owner (salesperson) that the quote has been accepted (with the quote ID)
No e-signature, I just want a simple button that does these things when clicked.

Honestly for this type of thing I would setup a simple zap to catch webhooks, whenever the zap catches a webhook then mark the quote as accepted in HubSpot, and send the email. The only thing from the custom quote end would be just adding that webhook request to trigger on button click

Hey Carter, hope you're doing well and had a nice easter! I heard about webhooks before but this is a bit over my head. From what I understand I need some type of third party service to use web hooks?
